definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The vacuolar amino acid pool is utilized during initiation of budding .
sentences.chinese: 當出芽開始時，液泡的氨基酸庫被利用。

sentences.english: In this article the regularity of amino acid replacement among homologues insulins was explored.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了同源胰島素間氨基酸取代的規律性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To study the compositions and contents of Amino Acids in the Fruit of Eucalyptus globulus Labill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究藍桉果實中氨基酸的種類並測定其含量。

sentences.english: Together, they read the genetic code and match it up to amino acids (see diagram).
sentences.chinese: 同時，他們讀取基因密碼子並將其與氨基酸進行匹配。

sentences.english: The result show that all the natural amino-acids will follow the rule of helix theory.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，氨基酸類化合物也遵從螺旋理論的規律。

sentences.english: L-histidine is an alkalescence amino acid with an imidazole group.
sentences.chinese: 組氨酸是含咪唑核的鹼性氨基酸。

sentences.english: The 'head'amino acids arise to a great extent by a process of transamination.
sentences.chinese: “爲首的”氨基酸很大程度上在轉氨作用過程中出現。

sentences.english: Thermostability of enzymes can be altered by single amino acid substitution.
sentences.chinese: 單一氨基酸的置換可以改變酶的熱穩定性。

sentences.english: It may be one of the characteristics of metabolism of plasma amino acids in hyperthyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是甲亢患者氨基酸代謝的特徵之一。

sentences.english: Human pancreatic ribonuclease has 128 amino acid residues.
sentences.chinese: 人的胰腺核糖核酸酶有128個氨基酸殘基。

sentences.english: Bile also neutralizes some of the acids that are found in certain types of food.
sentences.chinese: 膽汁也中和某些氨基酸被發現在某些類型的食物。

sentences.english: The standardized ileal digestibility of amino acids in domestic double-low rapeseed meal was lower.
sentences.chinese: 國產雙低菜籽粕的氨基酸標準迴腸末端消化率較低。

sentences.english: It concluded Se, Zn-aminoacid remedy given a great effects on children zinc deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 可見硒鋅氨基酸治療兒童鋅缺乏症取得顯著療效。

sentences.english: The open reading frame encodes a protein of 574 aa.
sentences.chinese: 開放閱讀框編碼574個氨基酸。

sentences.english: Glutamine and nonessential amino acids do no need to add superfluity.
sentences.chinese: 在培養基中不需要額外添加谷氨醯胺和非必需氨基酸。

sentences.english: One-Pot Preparation of N-Carbamate Protected Amino Acids via Azide.
sentences.chinese: 氨基甲酸經疊氮化保護氨基酸的一勺燴製備。

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
